docs.snippet: With goodwill now valued more highly than ever, the advertising specialty business will continue to grow and prosper, it was predicted yesterday by W. E. Coffman, president of the Advertising Specialty National Association.

docs.snippet: Foreign exchange market during the past week was quiet with the British pound sterling and the Canadian dollar developing a softer tone. Business transacted was not very large and aside from a few instances was mostly routine.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., March 21 -- From watch posts all along this side of the Iron Curtain, the United States has put together for the first time the story of the men and women -- 15,000 so far -- who have risked the mine fields and electrified...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., March 21 -- From watch posts all along this side of the Iron Curtain, the United States has put together for the first time the story of the men and women -- 15,000 so far -- who have risked the mine fields and electrified barbed-wire fences that guard the borders of Soviet-ruled Eastern Europe and made the dash westward.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., March 27 -- Sixteen nations fighting for the United Nations in Korea struck back today at Communist charges that the United States was using germ warfare weapons by formally challenging the Soviet world to accept international...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., March 27 -- Sixteen nations fighting for the United Nations in Korea struck back today at Communist charges that the United States was using germ warfare weapons by formally challenging the Soviet world to accept international investigation of the accusations.
docs.abstract: 16 UN members with troops in Korea sponsor resolution, UN com, challenging USSR bloc to accept internatl probe of charges; challenge Communists to allow captured US pilots who 'confessed' germ war role to be questioned by UN group in neutral nation; Amb Gross (US) says Communists use 'big lie' technique; US files formal depositions by Joint Cs/s, 3 gens, 4 cols and 1 m/sgt denying every detail of airmen's 'confession'; USSR resolution asking role in debate for Communist China and NK rejected, 40-15; 5 abstain
